item.title: CVE-2015-0841|2024-08-06T04:26:11.014Z -- monopd -- monopd
item.description: Off-by-one error in the readBuf function in listener.cpp in libcapsinetwork and monopd before 0.9.8, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a long line.
